channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report I-2024030004
item.description:
Report I-2024030004

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-19
  • City: Hanover
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 02/19/2023 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL BWI Service Center, 1328 Charwood Rd, Hanover, MD 21076. Transportation by road has been confirmed.

item.title: Report X-2024021902
item.description:
Report X-2024021902

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO BAY 155 FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDED WITH FULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, CONTAINED THE PACKAGE IN A SPILL TUB AND RETURNED TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024021790
item.description:
Report X-2024021790

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered damaged on load side package was dropped.upon inspection one bottle was shattered leaking out 4 liters of content. DescribePack: failure was due to package being dropped.Resulting in internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: loose absorb was used to address spill.package was placed in hazmat tote and put under ventilation system.

item.title: Report X-2024021708
item.description:
Report X-2024021708

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO RESPOND TO A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE METRO. RESPONDER DONNED PPE, (GOGGLES, GLOVES, BOOTS AND APRON) AND PREPARED TO RESPOND TO THE SPILL. FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS, RESPONDER CONTAINED THE SPILL AND DECONTAMINATED THE SPILL AREA. ALL WASTE WAS DISPOSED OF THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024021862
item.description:
Report X-2024021862

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-05T15:11:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-26
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024021400
item.description:
Report X-2024021400

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-04T15:11:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer , pulled off conveyor belt, placed in red hazmat container and taken to designated hazmat area. Gloves and absorbent pads were used to transport the package. DescribePack: Puncture whole on the top\side of the plastic container/ pail DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The plastic container was kept right side up to prevent any leakage.
